data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
My reasoning for the namespace choice of the rootlevel name 'Wily'
    is that I can't find an existing namespace it fits into.

    I would be happy to have it reside in some other namespace if
    someone else can see a place it fits.

    One option I though of is the Acme::Wily, since the Wily editor is
    a workalike of the Acme editor from plan9 - but that is subverting
    the meaning of Acme::.

    As I said, I'm happy for it to go somewhere else, if someone will
    say where.
